text: (CORRECTS typo) A Banksy artwork self-destructs moments after being sold at auction for $1.4 million, in a prank apparently orchestrated by the elusive street artist.

text: Mysterious street artist Banksy has proven he is still one step ahead during an auction in London. #7News

text: Going, going, gone! A Banksy artwork shredded itself after it was sold for more than £1m at Sotheby's in London.

name: Channel4News
text: A Banksy painting has ''self-destructed'' on the auction podium at Sotheby's in London after being sold for over £1m. Shortly after the hammer went down, ''Girl With Balloon'' was shredded by a mechanism apparently hidden within the base of the frame.

name: DanFleyshman
text: $1,300,000 BANKSY artwork piece just ''self-destructed'' right after it was sold at Sotheby's auction! (An alarm sound went off and the frame began to shred the art piece.)

name: nytimes
text: Moments after the gavel sounded on the $1.4 million sale of the Banksy artwork, an alarm sounded and it slipped through a shredder hidden in the frame, cutting it to pieces.
